member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.CreateEmployeeDTO.Email
member.summary: The email of the employee to be created

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.CreateEmployeeDTO.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the employee

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.CreateEmployeeDTO.LastName
member.summary: The last name of the employee

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.CreateEmployeeDTO.EmployeeTitleId
member.summary: The title id of the employee.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.CreateEmployeeTitleDTO.Title
member.summary: The employee title.

member.name: T:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.IsOpenDTO
member.summary: Contains information used to identify whether or not a given institution is open.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.IsOpenDTO.Open
member.summary: States whether or not a given institution is open.

member.name: T:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHourEmployeeDTO
member.summary: Containing public information about a single employee in an institution.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHourEmployeeDTO.Id
member.summary: The employee ID. Can be used across Employees and CheckedInEmployees to identify the same employee.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHourEmployeeDTO.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the employee.

member.name: T:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO
member.summary: Contains the public information about a single shift, and the employees.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.Id
member.summary: The ID of the shift.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.Start
member.summary: The starting date and time of the shift.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.End
member.summary: The ending date and time.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.Employees
member.summary: The attending employees.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.CheckedInEmployees
member.summary: The employees that have checked in for this shift.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.UpdateEmployeeDTO.Email
member.summary: The email of the employee. Leave empty string if the email should not be updated.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.UpdateEmployeeDTO.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the employee. Leave empty string if the first name should not be updated.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.UpdateEmployeeDTO.LastName
member.summary: The last name of the employee. Leave empty string if the last name should not be updated.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.UpdateEmployeeDTO.EmployeeTitleId
member.summary: The title id of the employee. Leave as 0 if the title should not be updated.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.UpdateEmployeeDTO.Active
member.summary: A flag saying if the employee is currently active or not.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.UpdateEmployeeTitleDTO.Title
member.summary: The employee title.

member.name: T:DataTransferObjects.Volunteers.VolunteerDTO
member.summary: Contains public information about the volunteers in an institution.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Volunteers.VolunteerDTO.Name
member.summary: The shown name of the volunteer.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Volunteers.VolunteerDTO.Title
member.summary: The title of the volunteer. This can for instance be "Barista".

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Volunteers.VolunteerDTO.Photo
member.summary: A photo of the volunteer.
